```{r}
library(readr)
dataset <- read.csv("/Users/Prateekg/Downloads/Midterm.csv")
dataset
```



```{r}
# Compute mean and covariance matrix
mean_vec <- colMeans(dataset[, -1])
cov_mat <- cov(dataset[, -1])
```



```{r}
# Compute MVA distance
mva_dist <- mahalanobis(dataset[, -1], mean_vec, cov_mat)
# Output MVA distances
mva_dist
```




```{r}
class_avg <- mean(mva_dist)

# Print MVA distances and class average
print("MVA Distances:")
print(mva_dist)
print(paste("Class Average:",class_avg))

```
